amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to implement a final rule by the Fish and Wildlife Service and a proposed rule from the National Park Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 91 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds to be used to implement a final rule by the Fish and Wildlife Service and a proposed rule from the National Park Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A076) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
